bottomActions.value: All attacks targeting you gain Disadvantage this round.

actions.value: Each time after an adjacent enemy attacks you, that enemy suffers damage equal to your Shield value.
The next five times an enemy enters a hex adjacent to you, the enemy suffers 2 damage.

bottomActions.value: All enemies moved through suffer 1 damage.

subActions.value: Add +3 %game.action.attack% if the target has a negative condition.
%game.action.loot% each hex you enter with this movement.
Each time the target is attacked this round, it suffers 1 damage. To signify this, place one of your character tokens on the target.
All enemies adjacent to the target suffer 1 damage.

actions.value: Place the Sand Devil in an adjacent empty hex. It is considered a trap for the purposes of monster focusing and movement. At the start of each of your turns, you may move it up to 2 hexes, and you may force any figure on it to move with it. Any time a figure moves onto the devil or vice versa (not when moving together), the figure suffers 1 damage and gains %game.condition.muddle%
The next four times an enemy enters a hex adjacent to you, that enemy gains %game.condition.disarm%.

subActions.value: One adjacent ally may perform an "%game.action.attack:3%" action
One different adjacent ally may perform an "%game.action.attack:3%" action

actions.value: Any time you are attacked this round, gain %game.action.shield:X% for the attack, where X is the number of enemies adjacent to you at the time of the attack, up to a maximum of 3.

bottomActions.value: The next five times an emeny enters a hex adjacent to you, perform a "%game.action.heal:3%, %game.specialTarget.self%" action.

subActions.value: all enemies adjacent to the target suffer 1 damage
